This might turn into the R cheatsheet eventually, but for now it's just a list of functions we use in the IDS labs. 

```{r} 
library(knitr)
opts_chunk$set(eval=FALSE)
```

```{r}
data() #data(cdc)
View() #View(cdc)
dim() #dim(cdc)
nrow() #nrow(cdc)
ncol() #ncol(cdc)
names() #names(cdc)
histogram() #histogram(~height, data = cdc)
bargraph() #bargraph(~sunscreen, data = cdc)
xyplot() #xyplot(weight~height, data = cdc)
```
